text: (Jenumanja n'di) chisawu awala wawaliji paujo penu, (chitukomboleche kun'jonanga mwatwajonanjile wanganyao, kutendaga) wanganyao waliji wakulimbangana nnope kumpunda wanganyammwe pamachili, niwakwete ipanje yejinji nnope kwisa soni wanache, basi ni wasangalalile liunjili lyao (lya duniya ndema jannono), basi nombe jenumanja ni nkuwa nkusangalalila liunjili lyenu (lya duniya kwandema jannono), yawatite pakusangalalila awala wawaliji paujo penu liunjili lyao, ni nkuwa nkutiwila (mmalowe gangali mate) yawatite pakutiwila wanganyao, wele wanyao ni wagajonasiche masengo gao pa duniya pano ni ku Akhera kwakwe, soni wanyao niwali wakwasika
